publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2350 Malcolm Chisholm: Prohibition of Female Genital Mutilation (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Prohibition of Female Genital Mutilation (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Johann Lamont*
